name.ja: <ruby>時<rt>とき</rt></ruby>の<ruby>機<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>械<rt>かい</rt></ruby>－タイム・マシーン

requirement.en: When exactly 1 monster is destroyed by battle.

effect.en: Special Summon that monster from the Graveyard to the same field it was on, in the same battle position it was in when destroyed (if that monster was in Maximum Mode, Special Summon all of it together in Maximum Mode).
